90))) ,NOT(Contains(LOWER(Name),"paychex")) ,NOT(Contains(LOWER(Name),"sample")) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Oasis Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'PEO Client')) ,ISBLANK(ParentId) ,ISBLANK( SalesParent__c) ,OwnerId != $Label.ReferralOwnerName ,OR(ISBLANK(CPA_Name_Ref__c),CPA_Name_Ref__r.Has_Sensitivity_Payroll__c = false) ,OR(ISBLANK(SensitivityList__c),NOT(CONTAINS(SensitivityList__c, "Payroll"))) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) ,Hosted_Client__c = false ,Related_Contact_has_Do_Not_Call__c = false ,Out_of_Business__c = false ,Benetrac_Indicator__c = false ,ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Bank Referral') = false ,ISNULL(Referral_National_Account__r.Dedicated_Rep__c)=false ,(NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Not Interested")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Disqualified"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(NSSStatus__c ,"Current/Lost Client")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(NSSStatus__c, "Already Contacted/Duplicate"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Wash"))&&NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Current Client"))) , Client_Status__c !="A" , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Current_Prior_Method__c, "Paychex")) , (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "I Out of Business"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "L Terminated for Non Payment"))&&NOT(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "T Transfer (Non Loss)"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "V Change of Entity (Non Loss)"))&&NOT(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "W Reload (Non Loss)"))) , Workable_Override__c = FALSE , Target_List__c =FALSE , CurrentClient__c = FALSE , Payroll_Workable__c = TRUE , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c , 'Paychex Referral Network')) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) )
